verbs.description: [ARG1: President Trump and first lady Melania] [V: arrived] [ARGM-TMP: early Thursday morning] [ARGM-PRP: to greet three Americans] [ARGM-TMP: as they flew into Joint Base Andrews , outside the U.S. capital] .
